hotelchain

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.FileHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuestRegistration, ReservationManager

    public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles reading and writing of a file storing an ArrayList of objects and a counter integer.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileHandler

        public FileHandler(java.lang.String _filename)
        Constructs a new FileHandler handling file with filename. Indicates whether the file indicated exists or whether a new file should be created.
        Parameters:
        _filename - Name of file.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        protected java.util.ArrayList<?> readFile()
        Reads the contents of the file, stores the counter and returns the ArrayList it contains.
        Returns:
        Returns the ArrayList contained in the file.

      • writeFile

        protected boolean writeFile(java.util.ArrayList<?> accounts,
                int _IDcounter)
        Writes a given ArrayList and integer to the file.
        Parameters:
        accounts - ArrayList to be written to file.
        _IDcounter - integer to be written to file.
        Returns:
        Returns whether filewrite was successful.

      • createNewFile

        protected boolean createNewFile()
        Returns:
        Returns whether creating a new file is required, returns false if file exists.

      • getIDcounter

        protected int getIDcounter()
        Returns:
        Returns integer read from file.
